## Hls.liveSyncPosition property

Position (in seconds) of live sync point (ie edge of live position minus safety delay defined by \`\`\`<!-- -->hls.config.liveSyncDuration<!-- -->\`\`\`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get liveSyncPosition(): number | null;
```
